text: CCSS.Math.Content.HSN.CN.C.7 Solve quadratic equations with real coefficients that have complex solutions.
CCSS.Math.Content.HSN.CN.C.8 (+) Extend polynomial identities to the complex numbers. For example, rewrite x .
CCSS.Math.Content.HSN.CN.C.9 (+) Know the Fundamental Theorem of Algebra; show that it is true for quadratic polynomials.
